snippet: Following a policy of Nicolas Sarkozy, French President François Hollande is taking down camps and offering incentives for Roma to leave.
abstract: French Pres Francois Hollande dismantles Roma encampments and rounds up the illegal travelers' group for expatriation; officials say decision to evict is based on sanitary concerns; charter plan flies 240 Roma, including children, back to Bucharest, Romania from Lyon, France.
lead_paragraph: Following a policy of Nicolas Sarkozy, French President François Hollande is taking down camps and offering incentives for Roma to leave.

headline.seo: Hollande Shuts Down Camps and Seeks Relocation for Roma
headline.main: French President Shuts Down Roma Camps and Seeks Relocation for Roma
headline.print_headline: French Leader Shuts Down Camps and Seeks Relocation for Roma
